snippet: More than 100,000 Long Island customers remained without power as of early Saturday afternoon, according to the Long Island Power Authority’s Web site.
abstract: Long Island and Connecticut continue to recover from Hurricane Sandy but more than 100,000 customers are still without power on Long Island; status of recovery efforts highlighted in chart.
lead_paragraph: More than 100,000 Long Island customers remained without power as of early Saturday afternoon, according to the Long Island Power Authority’s Web site.

headline.seo: Updates on Service Restoration in Long Island and Connecticut
